array.string: cd /Volumes/AI_DATA_CENTRE/AI_WORKSPACE/wave-tree-news-hub && /Users/seunghoonoh/.gemini/antigravity/scratch/node-v20/bin/node scripts/normalize.js --in data/raw/perplexity.txt --out data/normalized/news.json && cp data/normalized/news.json /Volumes/AI_DATA_CENTRE/AI_WORKSPACE/woonmok.github.io/news.json && /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.14/bin/python3 sync_top_news.py
